net.supersimple

Class AbstractNetwork

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.supersimple.AbstractNetwork
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractClassifier

    public abstract class AbstractNetwork
extends java.lang.Object
    Implements basic network of layers implementation

      • propagateForwards

        public final double[][] propagateForwards(double... inputs)
        Call this method to perform forwards propagation for the given inputs
        Parameters:
        inputs - Array of inputs that are passed to the input layer
        Returns:
        Array of outputs of all the layers, the last row of this array are outputs of the output layer
